Description:
Lifestyle Property with Views to Corio Bay
Commanding views of Corio Bay and evening sunsets dominate this idyllic property perched high on the slopes of Murradoc Hill overlooking the Drysdale countryside. Established trees give privacy and attract local birdlife whilst you absorb the peace and quiet.
Situated on approx 7.7 acres and known locally as the Black Hills. The black clay soil produces some of the best wine on the Bellarine. This majestic European-flavoured home was built to last with solid brick features and cedar timber panelling throughout. On entry the imposing living room has towering ceilings and open fireplace. The home flows seamlessly through a formal dining area, kitchen and family area all facing to the north-west providing natural light and warmth. Two minor downstairs bedrooms are serviced by a family bathroom and rumpus area or sitting room. Leading upstairs to the master suite is a study or fourth bedroom. The open loft-like retreat sits adjacent to the master bedroom and ensuite which incorporates its own balcony with spectacular views.
Outdoors is a blank canvas with potential plus for rolling gardens, a new vineyard or several paddocks for livestock. An over-sized double garage is attached to the main dwelling and a small outbuilding used as an observatory for star-gazing has power connected and manual opening roof. Town water is connected via a private line to the property with tank water available.
Inspection is a must for potential purchasers looking for that sea or tree change with the convenience of good schools, local amenities and leisure activities nearby. Contact the agent to arrange your appointment
to inspect this beautiful property on the outskirts of Drysdale.
Luke Campbell : 0409 554 949

Description:
Quaint cottage unit in town central location
If you are looking to downsize and wish to be in a premium, central location close to all community assets, then this one’s for you. Positioned a heartbeat away from the centre of Drysdale Village and offering extensive retail and medical facilities within walking distance, this clean and comfortable two bedroom unit allows independent living in an idealistic setting.
Greeted by graceful gardens upon approaching, the light and bright interior upon entry is a further welcomed element. Open plan kitchen, dining and living spaces are generous in size, with the dining area opening out onto an east facing patio, perfect for breakfast in the sun. The kitchen itself hosts modern appliances and a vast corner pantry unit.
Two bedrooms are both fitted with adequate built in robes and share the centralised bathroom with separate toilet. Creature comforts are taken care of with a wall panel heater and split system air conditioner allowing you to feel content, whatever the season. Shade awnings grace all of the homes windows externally, offering protection in summer and trapping warmth in winter. A remote single lock up garage is accessible through the home, dually opening out into a north facing, sun filled patio.
Your social and sporting needs are not forgotten with the Drysdale Bowling Club, Recreation Reserve and local Drysdale Hotel all within close proximity. Inspect today and discover the benefits of this superior, town centre location.

Description:
Centrally located large family home
Modern four bedroom family home with a welcoming facade & great street appeal. Offering privacy from the street is a well established hedgerow. Wide formal entry passage.
A large formal lounge & dining room would suit those seeking space.
Open plan kitchen with island bench, wall oven & gas hotplates overlooking casual lounge area & dining space.
Sliding door access to the yard. The backyard yard is very generous offering plenty of room for kids to run around.
A separate colourbond shed with power & lights would make a great mancave, classic car storage, workshop.
The double garage has drive through roller door access allowing plenty of secure vehicle storage.
Under cover access from the rear of the garage to the kitchen.
A kingsize master bedroom with a generous ensuite & walk in robe.
Large bedrooms with built in robes.
Ducted gas heating, split system airconditioning.
Located close to the centre of town, within easy walking to schools & shops.
The Bellarine Peninsula is fast being discovered as a great lifestyle area with the Port Phillip Ferry, Bunnings, newly opened Kmart & soon Coles in Drysdale but keeping that low paced feeling.

Description:
PRIVATE OASIS IN CENTRAL DRYSDALE
Privately set overlooking a reserve and billabong, your little piece of Bellarine Peninsula OASIS awaits. Set on approx. 773 square meters of land and built with a mix of modern flair and earthy tones, this picturesque property enjoys northerly all day sun, private yard space and proximity to schools and shops. Comprising 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, well-appointed kitchen, large open plan living, decking overlooking the billabong, alfresco entertaining overlooking the private yard and ample off street parking including large double garage. Polished hardwood floors, high ceilings, sun-drenched yard spaces, wood fire heating, air conditioning and established gardens all add to the appeal and charm of this unique Drysdale property.

Description:
Prime Location- Excellent Value!
A better location will be hard to find. Situated in the heart of Drysdale village you will find this hidden gem just a stroll to all Drysdale has to offer. A perfect down-sizer, weekender or investment opportunity set on an 485m2 allotment. Nothing to do but move in and enjoy the lifestyle that comes with living on the Bellarine Peninsula. The 3 bedroom property is located in a private setting with no passing traffic. Spacious lounge room that leads through to the kitchen & meals area of the home. Central gas heating as well as a reverse cycle spilt system keep the home comfortable all year round. Outdoor entertaining is a breeze on the extensive under cover decking. You could be forgiven for thinking you're out in the country with the lovely rural aspect on offer when on the deck. This home is a must to inspect and has so much to offer the lucky purchaser.

Description:
Stylish Family Home Located in Quiet Court Location
In a premier court location lies this architecturally designed home, built to the highest of standards with exceptional spaces for family living and entertaining, sitting on an impressive 638m2 (approx.) allotment. Bringing an easy-going yet sophisticated feel and elegance upon stepping foot in the door, with beautiful high raked ceilings, a clever floor plan and a great mix of internal and alfresco living spaces creating an ease of living rarely seen in modern designs. A spacious walk in robe and en-suite feature in the master bedroom, with a further two fantastic size bedrooms complete with built in robes and central bathroom, a study or fourth bedroom, three living zones, two alfresco entertaining areas and double garage provide for family living or great guest accommodation. Further features include a remote gas log fire, ducted heating, air-conditioning, an executive kitchen with top quality appliances and beautifully landscaped gardens give you exactly what should expected of a high-end quality home like this one. A truly exclusive property within a short stroll to Drysdale's schools, transport, walking tracks & central shopping precinct, the home has been built to impress so waste no time and inspect today!

Description:
When Only The Best Will Do!!
Central Walk Drysdale is widely known to be one of the most exciting land developments on the entire Bellarine Peninsula. Limited to an exclusive holding of approximately 200 quality lots. Beautiful architecturally designed parklands and wetlands just a stone's throw to the Drysdale township. Only a short drive to all that is a great about the Bellarine Peninsula- local wineries, vibrant cafe and restaurant scene, great schooling options. 5 Waterhaven Boulevard is undoubtedly one of the premium blocks within this entire estate, set on the high side of the road and with frontage to some stunning wetlands. Boasting approximately 635m2 of prime land in such an enviable location offers a beautiful place to start your new lifestyle and an exceptional investment for the future.

Situated in the beautifully landscaped Central Walk Estate, this is a great opportunity to secure land surrounded by other attractive homes and build the home of your dreams.
This is a fabulous location within walking distance to the historic Drysdale shopping and cafe hub and a short drive to the beach.

Description:
Entertainers Delight in Boutique Estate
Welcome to this spacious and modern home in Drysdale's prestigious Central Walk Estate.
Beautifully presented, with an excellent open plan for entertaining, this 4-bedroom home plus study sits adjacent to the estate's wetland with premiere views across the serene designer landscape. Families will love the convenience to the wide range of amenities in the town centre.
The cleverly designed zoning delivers a blissful lifestyle for the family. The master suite, with huge walk-in robe and luxurious en suite, sits in view of the wetland.
The spacious bedroom wing boasts three generous queen-sized bedrooms with built-in robes and a rejuvenating family bathroom with bath and shower.
An array of inviting living spaces separate the two zones. Northern light floods through the living areas with wide banks of sliding timber glass doors creating a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living.
The kitchen is at the hub of the design with a lavish Caesar stone island bench, 900mm cooking appliances and a butler's pantry. Lounge, living, dining and an alfresco room flow from the kitchen delivering an ideal set up for parenting and hosting.
The study sits closer to the entry, ideally placed for a home business.
The alfresco sits under the home's roofline and extends to a sun-drenched patio and lawned area. The backyard is secure for children and pets.
Caesar stone vanity bench tops throughout, designer lighting, double bracket roller blinds and porcelain tiling exemplify the high level of quality throughout. Ducted gas heating and a split system assist comfort.
Double garage with internal access. Significant investment in landscaping.
Enjoy the assets of the estate and connect to Drysdale's web of walking tracks from your front door.
Located only a five minute walk to the town centre, restaurants, and Christian College. You'll love this privileged family home!
Tim Cain : 0429 067 808

Description:
The Jewel in The Crown
This central Drysdale location is perfect for someone looking to maximise their investment dollar! With SO many opportunities available to the purchaser - renovate and extend the home, subdivide and build a townhouse or hold and watch the market grow! On approx. 1,000 square meters of land, a solid 1980s brick veneer home compliments the block by being strategically positioned to allow scope for subdivision and needs very little work done to have the property ready to live in today. Comprising 3 large bedrooms, central bathroom, second bathroom being a semi ensuite to the master bedroom, large formal lounge room and central kitchen with adjoining family room. This property could be the perfect jewel in your investment portfolio crown.

Description:
Prime Location-726m2 Allotment!
This neat home is situated a short distance to the town centre and is a terrific opportunity for first home buyers and investors alike. An astute developer might also see the potential in the large parcel of land. The home consists of family lounge room with gas heating plus adjoining kitchen and meals area. The 3 bedrooms are generously sized and all have built in robes. There is also a central study or compact second living area with doors that lead to the rear yard. Car accommodation consists of the single freestanding garage. There is also a small garden shed to house the lawn mower and associated tools. If you are looking to relocate to the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula to take advantage of all that's on offer in this part of the world then I suggest you take the time to inspect this property.

Description:
THIS HOME GLEAMS, AS NEW , FABULOUS POSITION AND GREAT DESIGN.
Set on a smaller block, maintained diligently and with the privacy of a leafy decked area, No. 1 Rowe is a great option for a downsize, first time buyer or investor. The open plan area combines living, kitchen and dining which all overlooks and opens to the deck. Three bedrooms, all with WIR'S, central 2 way bathroom which allows for powder room (good design feature) and laundry. Features include gas heater, split system, pantry, dishwasher, wide kitchen bench and fans. Single garage with direct internal access, garden shed. A perfect place to call home with schools, recreation grounds just around the corner and walking distance to the village... a pearl of a property!

Description:
Bigger & Better
Located in a highly sought after pocket with Drysdale Reserve, McLeods Waterholes and Drysdale shopping just a stroll away, this grand home is a cut above the rest. High ceilings, grand entrance, flowing open plan living spaces and a quality finish, coupled with a 1900 square meter block, brilliant shedding and alfresco entertaining with bar; this home really will appeal to those looking for something bigger and better. Comprising 3 large bedrooms, formal lounge, informal open plan family/dining room and a large billiards room flowing onto the outdoor entertaining. The home comes with a 4th bedroom or home office with a separate entrance & powder room, perfect for the extended family member or at-home consulting for the entrepreneur. Privacy, tranquillity and convenience can be expected from this quality home in a premier location.
